title: Citigroup Asia Pacific CEO Stephen Bird to Present at the Citi 2013 Global Financial Conference in Hong Kong
summary: New York - Stephen Bird, Chief Executive Officer of Asia Pacific, will present at the Citi 2013 Global Financial Conference in Hong Kong on Tuesday, November 19, 2013. The presentation is expected to begin at approximately 1 p.m. HKT (12 midnight EST), and will not be webcast or teleconferenced. Presentation materials will be available at www.citigroup.com/global/investors.
tag-1: Citigroup Asia Pacific CEO Stephen Bird to Present at the Citi 2013 Global Financial Conference in Hong Kong
tag-2: New York – Stephen Bird, Chief Executive Officer of Asia Pacific, will present at the Citi 2013 Global Financial Conference in Hong Kong on Tuesday, November 19, 2013. The presentation is expected to begin at approximately 1 p.m. HKT (12 midnight EST), and will not be webcast or teleconferenced. Presentation materials will be available at www.citigroup.com/global/investors.
tag-3: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
